frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering Co-located Alongside KubeCon + CloudNativeCon Europe
frontmatter.venue_address: Royal Victoria Dock, Western Gateway, London E16 1AL, United Kingdom
frontmatter.lead_text: This in person OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held on April 1st live in London, UK and co-located with CNCF's KubeCon + CloudNativeCon EU.
frontmatter.info_text: This Gathering will focus on talks from and by Cloud Native practitioners with production deployments sharing their use cases, insights into their workloads and lessons learned along the way.

schedule.session_name: Balancing Security, Risk and Innovation - How Red Hat Helps
Automating OpenShift in Telco with Validated Patterns Operator and GitOps
How ABB enables predictive maintenance & operator effectiveness with AI at the far edge
Enabling Advanced Networking in OpenShift: Adoption of Bring Your Own CNI for Cilium Integration
Accelerating AI/ML Workloads with OpenShift: Scaling Innovation in the Financial Services Industry
Using OCP Virt to modernise an Application in slow-time
Hands-On AI Optimization with Neural Magic and OpenShift AI
